title: Cost-benefit analysis for selecting a mine site

content.prompt:
A cost-benefit analysis done to investigate a proposed mine site would likely take which of the following into account?

  1. The medical costs of mine worker injuries

  2. The cost of environmental restoration of the site when it is shut down

  3. The value of the ore to be extracted from the mine

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Describe potential responses or approaches to environmental problems.
